text: Anɨb ak tek yad mɨdebɨm ak amɨl, ne chɨnop agjuwɨl tɨtay gup takaw ak agyɨkɨnɨgayn. Pen ne tɨmel anɨb ak nep ma gup. Mel. Ne mam God takaw agñɨ ajɨpal okok kɨlop ma yɨbɨl dup. Pen binɨb ogɨnap kɨli mam God takaw agñɨ ajɨpal okok kɨlop dɨnɨg gel, ne mel agɨl, kɨlop agup, Klays binɨb ne nab okok kelɨgɨl amnɨm agɨl, kɨlop agyokak.
